name: AWSDirectoryServiceSimpleADVpcSettings
description: VpcSettings is a property of the AWS::DirectoryService::SimpleAD resource that specifies the VPC settings for a directory server.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: A list of two subnet IDs for the directory servers. Each subnet must be in different Availability Zones (AZ). AWS Directory Service creates a directory server and a DNS server in each subnet.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The VPC ID in which to create the Simple AD directory.
